question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. bus stop
B. "Seltzer Way" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "Seltzer Way" sign is mounted on a pole in the immediate foreground, while the bus stop is further back on the sidewalk, making the sign clearly closer to the camera.
